messages.content:
HTML page with vertical bar that can be repositioned, with English filler text on the left side and Hebrew unicode filler text on the right side, using the broswer's text settings to correctly set the English text as left to right and the Hebrew text as right to left, with a user text input box below each of the texts, and the user input set properly at LTR or RTL and roman or Hebrew glyphs to match the text above them, and a button below
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
